heading: Today
text: ***FROST ADVISORY TONIGHT FOR THE ADIRONDACKS, ESSEX CO., VT, AND COOS CO., NH***Areas of dense river valley fog burning off by mid-morning.  Becoming mostly sunny.  Cool.  Highs in the 60s north, upper 60s to low 70s south.  Winds light, mostly west to northwest up to 10 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Clear and cool.  Areas of dense river valley fog.  Scattered frost in the cold spots.  Lows in the upper 30s to mid 40s, with low 30s in the cold spots.  Winds diminishing to light and variable.

heading: Tuesday
text: Dense fog through the river valleys burning off by mid-morning.  Sunny and not quite so cool.  Highs in the 70s, near 70 over the higher terrain north.  Light winds, becoming south up to 10 mph.
